challengeGuide: (Fourth Encounter): Guardians must dunk all four cores before DPS phases.
(First Encounter): Do not send any Debuffs into airlocks/space.
(Second Encounter): Each guardian must do all three roles (Operator, Scanner, and Suppressor). Note: Players must complete a full phase with a buff for it to count.
(Third Encounter): All players have to be operator and shoot the two panels on lower level (This challenge requires 3 phases).
(Fourth Encounter – Sanctified Mind): Once you deposit motes, you have 10 seconds to fully fill the bank.
(First Encounter): Complete the first 2 rooms without killing specific Cyclopes.
(Second Encounter): All six fire team members must replenish enlightenment at the same time.
(Third Encounter): Always deposit Ten (x10) motes at a time to summon the boss.

(Riven): Players must not shoot the same Riven eye more than once. 
*Remember to get the bounty from Hawthorne*

(Kalli): Activate all 9 plates, kill all Knights, and kill all Ogres in the middle before doing damage to Kalli. 
*Remember to get the bounty from Hawthorne*

(Shuro Chi): Do not get hit/take damage from Shuro Chi’s Arc Blast. 
*Remember to get the bounty from Hawthorne*

(Morgeth): Do not kill the small Ogres. 
*Remember to get the bounty from Hawthorne*

(Vault): Unlock the vault and keep Might of Riven Knights out of the center room. 
*Remember to get the bounty from Hawthorne*
